name: RETROIDS (itch)
description:
This is a game me and my friend made for the mini jam 

we are both still learning how to code but tried are best 

ITS CHRIMAS THEMEEDEDEDED D   :>>>>

CONTROLS: WASD, Arrow Keys, use mouse to aim, click to shoot

Mirror mechanic: There is a blue oval that appears in a random spot every five seconds you can use it to recache you presents towards the candy canes though i admit its a-bit janky Lol,   please leave a like or if you find any bugs lmk and ill patch em

Have a Good rest of your day
